review: Product arrived on time, in good condition. As for the device, it works beautifully. Stream everything from YouTube, to Netflix and HBOGO. One feature I love is that you can start the stream from one device and pick it up on another, so I can start a movie on my phone and pause it or stop it with my tablet or computer, and interchange on the fly. This is possible because once a stream is initiated, it is not tethered to that device. The device you use to stream only points the chromecast to the actual media and the chromecast does the rest. So once a stream is started the device is no longer required to sustain the stream. This is great if your watching a long movie and your phone or tablet dies. The only potential drawback is your internet. I would bet that anyone who could use this has the internet quality to stream video no problem, but if your internet bogs down or is intermittent, you will see a substantial drop in quality, or possible unable to use this product. BUYER BEWARE, this products performance is 100% dependent on the quality of your internet connection! If you have a substandard connection, you will get substandard performance!
